jcr:content.jcr:description: Coordinate Creation of Conversational Marketing Campaigns
jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe Campaign
jcr:content.description: Adobe Campaign lets you coordinate the creation of conversional marketing campaigns.
jcr:content.descriptionExtended: It allows for Profile Management, data segmentation and marketing capabilities, campaign creation, execution and management. personalization and publishing message using all communication channels, via a collaboration and approval process.
